features.given: A customer is browsing products on XXX Online Shopping 24/7
features.when: The customer selects desired products and proceeds to checkout
features.then: The customer can successfully place an order easily.

features.given: A customer has successfully placed an order
features.when: The system processes the order for delivery
features.then: The order delivery is scheduled for the earliest possible time.

features.given: A customer makes purchases on XXX Online Shopping
features.when: The system processes the customer's shopping information
features.then: The system stores this information for developing product advertisements and improving marketing strategy.

features.given: A Store IT Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The IT Personnel uses the user interface to add a new product
features.then: The product is correctly displayed on the system and stored in the database.

features.given: A Store IT Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The IT Personnel uses the user interface to remove an existing product
features.then: The product is correctly removed from the system and the database.

features.given: A Store IT Personnel is adding or updating a product via the visual interface
features.when: The IT Personnel uploads or modifies product images
features.then: The product images are synchronized correctly in the visual interface of the system.

features.given: The system is monitoring its operational environment
features.when: Inadequacy in hardware equipment or internet access speed is detected
features.then: Information about the inadequacy is provided to the relevant department of the company.

features.given: A potential customer attempts to purchase a product online
features.when: The customer is not a registered member of XXX Online Shopping
features.then: The system requires the customer to register and become a member before completing the purchase.

features.given: A Store IT Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The IT Personnel navigates to the product management section
features.then: Products are presented with a seamless graphical interface, allowing for add, remove, update, and associate operations.

features.given: Store Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The Store Personnel navigates to the product viewing section
features.then: Products are presented with a seamless graphical interface.

features.given: A customer is browsing products through www.sanalmarket.com or the XXX Online Shopping Mobile Application
features.when: The customer views a product
features.then: The product is presented without problems and its stock status is specified.

features.given: A customer provides personal information while in contact with XXX Online Shopping
features.when: XXX uses this personal information
features.then: The information is used in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

features.given: A customer provides personal information while in contact with XXX Online Shopping
features.when: XXX combines this information with other data
features.then: XXX uses the combined information to prepare and improve its products, services, content, and advertisements.

features.given: A Store IT Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The IT Personnel accesses the sales analysis section
features.then: The IT Personnel can analyze product sales data.

features.given: A Store IT Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The IT Personnel accesses the order management section
features.then: The IT Personnel can instantly see and analyze orders.

features.given: Store Personnel is logged into the system
features.when: The Store Personnel accesses the order viewing section
features.then: The Store Personnel can instantly see orders.

features.given: Store Personnel views an order in the system
features.when: The Store Personnel initiates the process to prepare the order for the supplier
features.then: The system facilitates the preparation of the order to the supplier.

features.given: A customer's order is successfully placed and processed
features.when: The ordered products are prepared for dispatch
features.then: The quantity of the ordered products automatically falls from stocks.

features.given: A customer accesses the XXX Online Shopping Platform
features.when: The customer navigates to the product catalog
features.then: The customer can see all products available in XXX Online Shopping Platform.

features.given: A user wants to register as a new customer
features.when: The user completes the registration process
features.then: The system requires personal information including Address, Phone Number, TC Number, and Mail Address

features.given: A Supplier is logged into the system
features.when: The Supplier initiates sending an order
features.then: The system allows the Supplier to successfully send the order

features.given: A Supplier has an order assigned for preparation
features.when: The Supplier interacts with the order in the system
features.then: The system allows the Supplier to prepare the order

features.given: A Customer visits the XXX stores online platform
features.when: The Customer browses the store
features.then: The Customer can see all products sold at XXX stores

features.given: A Customer is a registered member and has added products to their cart
features.when: The Customer proceeds to shop
features.then: The system enables the Customer to buy the products in their cart

features.given: Store Personnel identifies an order requiring preparation for a supplier
features.when: The Store Personnel processes the order
features.then: The system allows the Store Personnel to prepare the order to the supplier

features.given: Store Personnel is monitoring product stock
features.when: A product's stock level falls
features.then: The Store Personnel can see products that have fallen from stock

features.given: Store IT Personnel is logged into the system and navigating the product management interface
features.when: The Store IT Personnel decides to add a product, provides the product ID and other details via the user interface
features.then: The system adds the new product to the database

features.given: Store IT Personnel is logged into the system and navigating the product management interface
features.when: The Store IT Personnel selects the removal option and enters the corresponding product ID via the user interface
features.then: The system deletes the product from the database

features.given: Store IT Personnel is logged into the system and navigating the product management interface
features.when: The Store IT Personnel selects an existing product for update and makes necessary changes via the user interface
features.then: The system updates the product's details in the database

features.given: The system is running and 'Store IT Personal' has a valid username and password.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' enters the system and provides valid credentials.
features.then: The system verifies the credentials and displays the 'Store IT Personal' menu.

features.given: The system is running and 'Store IT Personal' has a valid username and password.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' enters an invalid username or password.
features.then: The system displays an error message and prompts 'Store IT Personal' to try again.

features.given: The system is running and 'Store IT Personal' has attempted to log in with incorrect credentials 3 times.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' enters an incorrect username or password for the 4th time.
features.then: The system blocks the account and notifies 'Store IT Personal' to communicate with the system admin.

features.given: 'Store IT Personal' is logged into the system and on the main menu.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' selects 'show products' and enters a product ID.
features.then: The system displays the selected product for 'Store IT Personal' to review.

features.given: 'Store IT Personal' is logged into the system and on the main menu.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' selects 'add products', the system creates an automatic ID, 'Store IT Personal' enters other product information, and clicks the 'add' button.
features.then: The system saves the new product information and proceeds to allow 'Store IT Personal' to check for changes.

features.given: 'Store IT Personal' is logged into the system and on the main menu, and a product with a specific ID exists.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' selects 'product remove', enters the product ID, confirms the deletion by clicking 'delete' and then 'I am sure'.
features.then: The system assigns the deleted product information to the 'deleted products' table in the database, deletes the product from the 'products' table, and proceeds to allow 'Store IT Personal' to check for changes.

features.given: 'Store IT Personal' is in the process of removing a product, and the system has asked for confirmation of deletion.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' clicks the 'I am not sure' button.
features.then: The system cancels the deletion process for the product and returns to the previous step (e.g., displaying the product or the removal menu).

features.given: 'Store IT Personal' has made changes or initiated a transaction and sees a mistake.
features.when: 'Store IT Personal' clicks the 'Transaction cancellation' button.
features.then: The system returns to its original state before the transaction or changes were made.

features.given: A customer is registered and logged in to the XXX online shopping platform, AND the customer has a valid credit card with sufficient funds.
features.when: The customer views available products, AND adds desired products to the shopping cart, AND confirms the order, AND enters valid credit card details, AND the payment authentication system approves the transaction.
features.then: The system processes the payment successfully, AND the supplier delivers the order and a bill to the customer, AND the customer receives the products within a short period of time.

features.given: A registered customer attempts to log in to the XXX online shopping platform.
features.when: The customer enters an invalid password (within the allowed retry limit).
features.then: The application displays an "invalid password" message, AND records the log, AND prompts the customer to try again.

features.given: A customer is making a purchase on the XXX online shopping platform, AND is at the step of entering credit card details.
features.when: The customer enters invalid credit card details.
features.then: The application displays an "incorrect credit card information" error message, AND prompts the customer to re-enter card details.

features.given: A customer is making a purchase on the XXX online shopping platform, AND has entered valid credit card details for verification.
features.when: The customer's credit card has insufficient funds for the purchase.
features.then: The system displays an error message indicating insufficient funds.

features.given: A person is browsing products on the application.
features.when: The person selects products and attempts to add them to the basket, AND the system verifies that the person is not a member.
features.then: The system notifies the person that they should become a member.

features.given: A customer has items in their shopping cart
features.when: The customer attempts to complete a purchase and their account balance is insufficient for the total amount
features.then: The application should display the error message: “Insufficient balance”

features.given: A customer is viewing their shopping cart
features.when: The customer adds, removes, or modifies quantities of items in the cart
features.then: The shopping cart should reflect the updated items and quantities

features.given: The application is operational
features.when: A network failure occurs, causing the application to lose connectivity
features.then: The application should become unavailable or 'out of order'

features.given: A new user attempts to register
features.when: The user provides a username that is already registered by another user
features.then: The system should prevent registration with that username and inform the user

features.given: A user is setting or updating their password
features.when: The user enters a password that is less than 6 characters, more than 20 characters, contains no letters, or contains no digits
features.then: The system should reject the password and inform the user about the required format (at least 6, at most 20 characters, at least 1 letter, and at least 1 digit)

features.given: A potential customer wants to become a member
features.when: The customer attempts to register without providing an email address or a password that meets the complexity rules
features.then: The system should require the customer to enter an email address and a valid password

features.given: A potential customer is registering as a member
features.when: The customer proceeds with registration without providing their Name, Surname, Date of birth, Gender, T.C. Identification number, or Money Card Type
features.then: The system should prompt the customer to provide all required personal information

features.given: A user attempts to log in to the application
features.when: The user provides valid credentials
features.then: The system should authenticate the user and grant access to their account

features.given: A user is logged in
features.when: The user attempts to perform an action for which they do not have authorization
features.then: The system should prevent the action and display an error message indicating unauthorized access

features.given: A customer is experiencing a problem with the application
features.when: The customer seeks help through the online support channel
features.then: Online support should provide assistance to resolve the customer's problem

features.given: A user's account is configured for Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
features.when: The user attempts to log in after providing initial credentials
features.then: The system should prompt the user for a second factor of authentication (e.g., a code from an authenticator app, an SMS code) before granting access
